column4: I can't connect to MySQL. I installed it, set a new password when asked but now I can't connect
ERROR 1045 (28000): Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: NO)
it's not using the password you need to give mysql a password for the account when your trying to login
when you do mysql -u root -p hit enter it will ask you for the password like it did enter your password there since I bet foo is not your password
